description: Boing is a toolkit designed to support the development of multi-touchand gesture enabled applications.It enables to create pipelines for connecting different input sources tomultiple target destinations (e.g. applications, logs, etc.)  andeventually process the data before being dispatched.
longdescription: Boing is a toolkit designed to support the development of multi-touchand gesture enabled applications.It enables to create pipelines for connecting different input sources tomultiple target destinations (e.g. applications, logs, etc.)  andeventually process the data before being dispatched.
